attributes.additional_details: We need the government to listen to your stories and recognise the seriousness and devastation of one punch. We cannot achieve this without your support.
attributes.background: We want to introduce a "One Punch Manslaughter Law"with a 5-10 year sentence minimum, instead of 2-10 years - The average being 3.  Australia introduced the “Coward’s Punch Manslaughter Law, with a 10 year mandatory minimum.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The law on manslaughter already allows a maxiumum sentence of life imprisonment. We're not sure exactly what further action you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more here: 

https://www.sentencingcouncil.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/Manslaughter-definitive-guideline-Web.pdf

You could start a new petition asking the Government to make unlawful act manslaughter carry a minimum sentence of 10 years, if thats something you'd like to see happen.
